description: These sand dunes are treacherous, and you need to get unstuck before the desert racers catch up and demand their prize back!

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically play the car trouble sound.
puzzles.introduction: Dash the dune buggy is having a little car trouble.

hints.description: Link the state with an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: After playing the car trouble sound, make Dash automatically return to Start.
puzzles.introduction: No matter what Dash does, the engine just won't start.

hints.description: Make a loop! Link the states with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: While playing the car trouble sound, make Dash take off when Dash moves forward or moves backward.
puzzles.introduction: Dash needs you to offer a little push to get the engine running. Use the Move Forward and Move Backward cues to detect pushes in either direction.

hints.description: You can add more than one cue between states! Link the Car trouble sound to the Take Off state using Move Forward and Move Backward cues.

puzzles.description: After taking off, make Dash automatically move forward at 80 cm/s. Then make Dash wait for 2.0 s and stop.
puzzles.introduction: Thanks for the push! Dash is ready to take off at top speed!

hints.description: Set the Move state to 80 cm/s in the forward direction. Link the Move state with an Auto cue. Link the Stop state with a Wait For cue set to 2.0s.
